    ---- examine the data types of the table

    EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://synapsestr.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
         FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]'


    -- max length of the columns

SELECT
   MAX(LEN(LocationID)) AS len_loctionID,
   MAX(LEN(Borough)) AS len_Borough,
   MAX(LEN(Zone)) AS LEN_Zone,
   MAX(LEN(service_zone)) AS service_zone

FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsestr.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]

    --- use WITH clause oto provide explicit data types

SELECT
*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsestr.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR (15),
        Zone VARCHAR (50),
        service_zone VARCHAR (15)
        ) 
        AS [result]

--- checking the data type to confirm it returns as expected

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://synapsestr.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR (15),
        Zone VARCHAR (50),
        service_zone VARCHAR (15)
        ) 
        AS [result]'

--- check out the database collation
SELECT name, collation_name from sys.databases;

-- update collation. Apply on each column

SELECT
*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsestr.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR (15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        Zone VARCHAR (50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        service_zone VARCHAR (15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
        ) 
        AS [result]


-- update colltion, apply at the database level

CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery;


USE nyc_taxi_discovery
GO

ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

)

*
